* Recode new SAT (1600 scale) to old SAT (1600 scale)

RECODE new_sat (400=400)
(410=410)
(420=410)
(430=420)
(440=430)
(450=430)
(460=440)
(470=450)
(480=450)
(490=460)
(500=470)
(510=470)
(520=480)
(530=490)
(540=490)
(550=500)
(560=510)
(570=510)
(580=520)
(590=530)
(600=540)
(610=540)
(620=550)
(630=560)
(640=560)
(650=570)
(660=580)
(670=580)
(680=590)
(690=600)

(890=810)

(950=870)

(1270=1200)
(1280=1210)
(1290=1220)
(1300=1230)
(1310=1250)
(1320=1260)
(1330=1270)
(1340=1280)
(1350=1290)
(1360=1300)
(1370=1310)
(1380=1320)
(1390=1330)
(1400=1340)
(1410=1350)
(1420=1370)
(1430=1380)
(1440=1390)
(1450=1400)
(1460=1410)
(1470=1420)
(1480=1430)
(1490=1450)
(1500=1460)
(1510=1470)
(1520=1490)
(1530=1500)
(1540=1510)
(1550=1530)
(1560=1540)
(1570=1560)
(1580=1570)
(1590=1580)
(1600=1600) INTO old_sat.


* Usage example:

INPUT PROGRAM.
LOOP id=1 to 10.
END CASE.
END LOOP.
END FILE.
END INPUT PROGRAM.
EXECUTE.

COMPUTE new_sat=TRUNC(RV.UNIFORM(400,1600),10).
EXECUTE.

RECODE new_sat (400=400)
(410=410)
(420=410)
(430=420)
(440=430)
(450=430)
(460=440)
(470=450)
(480=450)
(490=460)
